commit.message:
codecvt.html: Formatting cleanups.


2000-08-30  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>

	* docs/22_locale/codecvt.html: Formatting cleanups.
	* src/locale.cc (ctype<wchar_t>::do_is): Fix thinko.

From-SVN: r36079

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2000-08-30  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>
+
+	* docs/22_locale/codecvt.html: Formatting cleanups.
+	* src/locale.cc (ctype<wchar_t>::do_is): Fix thinko.
+
 2000-08-30  Benjamin Kosnik  <bkoz@redhat.com>
 
 	* bits/locale_facets.h (ctype<char>): Remove __table_type.

@@ -372,7 +372,10 @@

5. Examples

-a. conversions involving string literals + +
    +
  • + a. conversions involving string literals 
       typedef codecvt_base::result			result;
@@ -412,22 +415,27 @@ 
    
   VERIFY( efrom_next == e_lit + size );
   VERIFY( ito_next == i_arr + size );
    +
  • b. conversions involving std::string +
  • c. conversions involving std::filebuf and std::ostream +
More information can be found in the following testcases: -codecvt_char_char.cc -codecvt_unicode_wchar_t.cc -codecvt_unicode_char.cc -codecvt_wchar_t_char.cc +
    +
  • testsuite/22_locale/codecvt_char_char.cc +
  • testsuite/22_locale/codecvt_unicode_wchar_t.cc +
  • testsuite/22_locale/codecvt_unicode_char.cc +
  • testsuite/22_locale/codecvt_wchar_t_char.cc +

6. Unresolved Issues

  • - a. things that are sketchy, or remain unimplemented + a. things that are sketchy, or remain unimplemented: do_encoding, max_length and length member functions are only weakly implemented. I have no idea how to do this correctly, and in a generic manner. Nathan?
